name: Void Liberation
text: Reveal 1 "Shaddoll" card in your hand; add 2 "Shaddoll" cards from your Deck to your hand of different types (Monster, Spell, or Trap) from the revealed card and each other, then discard 1 card. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Infernoid" monster from your Deck or GY your hand. You can only use each effect of "Void Liberation" once per turn.
